table.name: accession
table.desc: Tracks accessions and be be part of a Repository Agreement.

field.name: lastEditedBy
field.desc: The user who last saved the record.

field.name: number
field.desc: A user-visible identifier of the Accession. Typically an integer, but may include alphanumeric characters as prefix, suffix, and separators

field.name: timestampCreated
field.desc: The timestamp the record was created.

field.name: timestampModified
field.desc: The timestamp the record was last modified.

table.name: accessionagent
table.desc: The person(s) requesting the Accession. This references an Agent.

field.name: lastEditedBy
field.desc: The user who last saved the record.

field.name: role
field.desc: Role the agent played in the accession process

field.name: timestampCreated
field.desc: The timestamp the record was created.

field.name: timestampModified
field.desc: The timestamp the record was last modified.

table.name: accessionattachment
table.desc: An attachment for the Accession. This may be one or more PDF files of paperwork or a photo of the Accession.

table.name: accessionauthorization
table.desc: This represents the person authorizing the Accession. It references and existing Agent.

field.name: lastEditedBy
field.desc: The user who last saved the record.

field.name: timestampCreated
field.desc: The timestamp the record was created.

field.name: timestampModified
field.desc: The timestamp the record was last modified.

table.name: address
table.desc: The address of a Agent. This also captures a start and end date for the address and the position held while at the address.

field.name: address
field.desc: Address as it should appear on mailing labels

field.name: endDate
field.desc: The last date the agent was at the address

field.name: isPrimary
field.desc: Indicates whether this is the primary address

field.name: lastEditedBy
field.desc: The user who last saved the record.

field.name: positionHeld
field.desc: The position held by the agent while at this address

field.name: roomOrBuilding
field.desc: The room or building of the agent

field.name: startDate
field.desc: The first date the the agent was at this address

field.name: timestampCreated
field.desc: The timestamp the record was created.

field.name: timestampModified
field.desc: The timestamp the record was last modified.

table.name: agent
table.desc: This represents a Person, Organization, Group or Other. For example, an Agent can be a Cataloger, Determiner, Shipper, etc.

field.name: agentType
field.desc: Discriminator between Organization(0), Person(1), Other(2), and Group(3)

field.name: authorName
field.desc: The named used when authoring publications

field.name: collectorName
field.desc: The name used as a collector

field.name: jobTitle
field.desc: Agent's (person) job title at specified address and organization

field.name: lastEditedBy
field.desc: The user who last saved the record.

field.name: timestampCreated
field.desc: The timestamp the record was created.

field.name: timestampModified
field.desc: The timestamp the record was last modified.

field.name: url
field.desc: An URL for their web site

table.name: agentattachment
table.desc: This is primarily used by Botanists for capturing Variant and Vernacular names. This table is searchable by does not have any specific business rules assiciated with it.

table.name: agentvariant
table.desc: Internal to Specify, this represents a resource, typically XML, that the application uses durng runtime.

field.name: lastEditedBy
field.desc: The user who last saved the record.

field.name: name
field.desc: THe full name used as a variant or vernacular name

field.name: timestampCreated
field.desc: The timestamp the record was created.

field.name: timestampModified
field.desc: The timestamp the record was last modified.

field.name: varType
field.desc: Indicates whether the record is a variant (0) or a vernacular name (1)

table.name: appresource
table.desc: Internal to Specify, this represents a resource, typically XML, that the application uses during runtime.

field.name: lastEditedBy
field.desc: The user who last saved the record.

field.name: timestampCreated
field.desc: The timestamp the record was created.

field.name: timestampModified
field.desc: The timestamp the record was last modified.

table.name: appresourcedata
table.desc: The data associated with an application resource.

field.name: lastEditedBy
field.desc: The user who last saved the record.

field.name: timestampCreated
field.desc: The timestamp the record was created.

field.name: timestampModified
field.desc: The timestamp the record was last modified.

table.name: appresourcedefault
table.desc: This represents the actual attachment. The attachment itself is not sorted in the database. The information in this record identifies everything the application will need to load and display the attachment. The attacjment location is an absolute path to the attachment file.

field.name: lastEditedBy
field.desc: The user who last saved the record.

field.name: timestampCreated
field.desc: The timestamp the record was created.

field.name: timestampModified
field.desc: The timestamp the record was last modified.

table.name: attachment
table.desc: This represents the actual attachment. The attachment itself is not sorted in the database. The information in this record identifies everything the application will need to load and display the attachment. The attachment location is an absolute path to the attachment file.

table.name: attachmentmetadata
table.desc: This hold meta data about the attachment. It is a set of named value pairs.

field.name: lastEditedBy
field.desc: The user who last saved the record.

field.name: name
field.desc: The name of the meta data field

field.name: timestampCreated
field.desc: The timestamp the record was created.

field.name: timestampModified
field.desc: The timestamp the record was last modified.

field.name: value
field.desc: The value of the meta data field.

table.name: attributedef
table.desc: The definition of an attribute

field.name: dataType
field.desc: The data type of the attribute

field.name: fieldName
field.desc: The field name of the attribute

field.name: lastEditedBy
field.desc: The user who last saved the record.

field.name: tableType
field.desc: The type of table it is attached to, this is internal to Specify

field.name: timestampCreated
field.desc: The timestamp the record was created.

field.name: timestampModified
field.desc: The timestamp the record was last modified.

table.name: author
table.desc: An Author is a reference to an Agent and provides the order for a list of authors of a Reference Work

field.name: lastEditedBy
field.desc: The user who last saved the record.

field.name: orderNumber
field.desc: Their position in a list of authors

field.name: timestampCreated
field.desc: The timestamp the record was created.

field.name: timestampModified
field.desc: The timestamp the record was last modified.

table.name: borrow
table.desc: A Borrow represents a Loan from another Collection to yours.

field.name: currentDueDate
field.desc: Date loan is currently due. (Same as Orignal Due Date unless loan period has been extended)

field.name: isClosed
field.desc: Indicates whether the borrow was closed (returned)

field.name: lastEditedBy
field.desc: The user who last saved the record.

field.name: timestampCreated
field.desc: The timestamp the record was created.

field.name: timestampModified
field.desc: The timestamp the record was last modified.

table.name: borrowagent
table.desc: Refers to an Agent and describes their 'role' in the borrowing process.

field.name: lastEditedBy
field.desc: The user who last saved the record.

field.name: role
field.desc: Role played by agent in borrow

field.name: timestampCreated
field.desc: The timestamp the record was created.

field.name: timestampModified
field.desc: The timestamp the record was last modified.

table.name: borrowmaterial
table.desc: Describe the material being borrowed

field.name: description
field.desc: Description of the material. 'e.g. Bufo bufo skull'

field.name: inComments
field.desc: Notes concerning the receipt of the material

field.name: lastEditedBy
field.desc: The user who last saved the record.

field.name: outComments
field.desc: Notes concerning the return of the material

field.name: quantityResolved
field.desc: Quantity resolved (Returned, Accessioned, Lost, Discarded, Destroyed ...)

field.name: timestampCreated
field.desc: The timestamp the record was created.

field.name: timestampModified
field.desc: The timestamp the record was last modified.

table.name: borrowreturnmaterial
table.desc: Desribes the material that was returned.

field.name: lastEditedBy
field.desc: The user who last saved the record.

field.name: returnedDate
field.desc: The date the material was returned

field.name: timestampCreated
field.desc: The timestamp the record was created.

field.name: timestampModified
field.desc: The timestamp the record was last modified.

table.name: catalognumberingscheme
table.desc: Internal Specify table for describing numbering schemes. It enables multiple collections to share a numbering scheme.

field.name: isNumericOnly
field.desc: Indicates it is a completely numeric catalog number scheme

field.name: lastEditedBy
field.desc: The user who last saved the record.

field.name: schemeClassName
field.desc: The Java Class that implements the scheme

field.name: timestampCreated
field.desc: The timestamp the record was created.

field.name: timestampModified
field.desc: The timestamp the record was last modified.

table.name: collectingevent
table.desc: Describes a Collecting Event. For some disciplines, like Botany this hidden and only the start state may be used.

field.name: groupPermittedToView
field.desc: The name of the group that this record is visible to.

field.name: lastEditedBy
field.desc: The user who last saved the record.

field.name: method
field.desc: The method used to obtain the biological object

field.name: stationFieldNumber
field.desc: Station number or field number of the site where collecting event took place, A number or code recorded in field notes and/or written on field tags that identifies ALL material collected in a Collecting Event.

field.name: timestampCreated
field.desc: The timestamp the record was created.

field.name: timestampModified
field.desc: The timestamp the record was last modified.

field.name: verbatimDate
field.desc: Date which collector recorded in field book, exactly as reported by the collector. Should indicate whether reported as range, season, month, etc.

field.name: verbatimLocality
field.desc: Original statement (literal quotation) of the location of the Collecting Event as given by the Collector.

table.name: collectingeventattachment
table.desc: Refers to an attachment and provides and order.

field.name: lastEditedBy
field.desc: The user who last saved the record.

field.name: timestampCreated
field.desc: The timestamp the record was created.

field.name: timestampModified
field.desc: The timestamp the record was last modified.

table.name: collectingtrip
table.desc: Used to group Collecting Events together.

field.name: endDate
field.desc: The ending date of the collecting trip

field.name: endTime
field.desc: The ending time of the collecting trip

field.name: startDate
field.desc: The start date of the collecting trip

field.name: startTime
field.desc: The start time of the collecting trip

field.name: timestampCreated
field.desc: The timestamp the record was created.

field.name: timestampModified
field.desc: The timestamp the record was last modified.

table.name: collection
table.desc: A collection hold Collecting Object and all are of the same type.

field.name: collectionPrefix
field.desc: A short character prefix or abbreviation.

field.name: lastEditedBy
field.desc: The user who last saved the record.

field.name: timestampCreated
field.desc: The timestamp the record was created.

field.name: timestampModified
field.desc: The timestamp the record was last modified.

table.name: collectionobject

field.name: catalogNumber
field.desc: The catalog number of the specimen

field.name: catalogedDateVerbatim
field.desc: The verbatim date the specimen was collected

field.name: deaccessioned
field.desc: True if the object has been deaccessioned

field.name: fieldNumber
field.desc: The number giving to the specimen in the field.

field.name: lastEditedBy
field.desc: The user who last saved the record.

field.name: timestampCreated

field.name: bottomDistance
field.desc: The distance to the bottom of the position.

field.name: distanceUnits
field.desc: The units for the distances, feet or meters

field.name: lastEditedBy
field.desc: The user who last saved the record.

field.name: positionState
field.desc: How it was found: float or in-situ
